reference_details.sea_guard_reaper_or_sky_sloop: Sky Sloop or Sea Guard Reaper

options.name: Scroll of the Pearl Throne
options.description:
Choose a Magic Item from an enemy unit that is in contact with the bearer. This Magic Item is ignored and ceases to be an Enchanted item. Duration: Permanent.

Note: it still provides its mundane effects.

options.name: Daemon's Bane
options.description: +2 Arm against Magical Attacks.

options.name: Star Metal Alloy
options.description:
+1 Arm, which is improved to +2 Arm for models without Mount.
The bearer can never be wounded on a roll better than 3+.

options.name: Protection of Dorac
options.description:
+3 Def, +3 Arm, and Attached.
The model’s Armour can never be improved beyond 5.

options.name: Gleaming Robe
options.description:
Aegis(3+).
The wearer’s Armour is set to 1 and can never be improved beyond this.
If the wearer Miscasts and rolls Witchfire, the number of hits are halved (rounding fractions up) for the wearer and its unit.

options.name: Elemental Blade
options.description:
+1 Att, +1 Str.

When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, choose to gain either Flaming Attacks, Lightning Attacks. Duration: Round of Combat.

options.name: Navigator's Banner
options.description: The bearer's unit gains First Strike(Aegis(5+)).

options.name: Banner of Becalming
options.description: In each of the opponent’s Magic Phases, immediately after Excess Magic, the opponent must discard 1 Magic Dice.

options.name: War Banner of Rymâ
options.description:
A unit with one or more War Banners of Rymâ gains +1" Cha.

In addition, Rank-and-File model parts with Elf in the unit gain Devastating Charge(+1 Str).

options.name: War Banner of Ryma
options.description: xx

options.name: Nova Flare
options.description:
Devastating Charge(+1 Att), Lethal Strike, Divine Attacks.
One use only. May be used when Choosing Equipment and Abilities: the wielder counts as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge with duration: Round of Combat.

options.name: Sliver of the Blazing Dawn
options.description:
+1 Str, +2 AP.
Each successful to-hit roll with this weapon causes two hits instead of one.

options.name: Cadaron's Heartwood
options.description: Shots 3, Str as user +1, and AP as user +1.

options.name: Book of Meladys
options.description: The first time in each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell cast with two or three Magic Dice, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice.

options.name: Diadem of Protection
options.description: Aegis(+2, max 4+).

options.name: Amethyst Crystal
options.description: Unless the bearer is Shaken, Dispelling Rolls made by the bearer’s army gain a +1 modifier; if the target of an enemy spell is within 18" of the bearer, that modifier is increased to +2.

options.name: Asfad Scholar
options.description:
The model gains Channel (1).
The Range of the Wizard’s Learned Spells is increased by 6".
Aura spells gain +3" Range instead, while spells with type Caster are unaffected.

options.name: Order of the Fiery Heart
options.description: Order of the Fiery Heart

options.name: Master of Canreig Tower
options.description:
The model gains Master of Spellcrafting, Wizard Conclave (3).

The model has these spells available: Living Steel, Altered Sight, Fountain of Youth, Whispers of the Veil, Predator’s Instinct, Mind Fog, Favour of Meladys.

options.name: High Warden of the Flame
options.description: The model gains Aegis (4+), Fearless, Stubborn.

options.name: Fleet Officer
options.description:
The model gains Strider (Water Terrain), Resolute.
If the models unit contains a model that already has Resolute from another source, the unit is considered to have two additional Proper Ranks instead of one.
The bearer also gains Lightning Attacks and, if using a Longbow, Stand and Shoot.

options.name: Grandmaster of the Sword
options.description:
The model gains , First Strike (+1 Def, +1 Off), Sword Sworn.
While joined to a unit containing Sword Masters, the model's unit benefits from +1 Agi.

options.name: Royal Huntsman
options.description:
The model must take Great Weapon and cannot take Shield.
The model gains Lion’s Fur, Valiant, and the bearer gains Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 4--5).
While joined to a unit containing Lion Guards, the model's unit benefits from Swiftstride.

options.name: Queen's Cavalier
options.description:
The bearer gains First Strike (+1 Att, +1 Off) and the bearers unit may reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

If the model has Height 5, Regal Dragons and Ancient Dragons replace their Ancient Allies (2) rule with Ancient Allies (1), and Phoenixes replace Ancient Allies (1) with Ancient Allies (2).

options.name: Queen's Companion
options.description: The model’s Longbow Shots are set to 3, and the model’s unit gains Accurate.

options.name: Moonlight Arrows
options.description:
Can only be used with Longbows without Weapon Enchantments.
The attack gains Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, and its Strength is set to 4.
